fraudTooltip: Fraud: means any deceitful act committed by employees or other parties, including a misrepresentation that knowingly or recklessly misleads, or attempts to mislead, the victim of deceit in order to obtain a financial or other benefit or to unlawfully avoid an obligation of a party committing the fraud or for third parties. Or A misleading conduct done by someone, with the objective to get an illegal advantage or to harm someone else’s (victim’s) rights is commonly known as Fraud.
